author: IGN
description:
Check out the new We Bury The Dead trailer for this upcoming horror thriller movie starring Daisy Ridley (Star Wars: Episode VII – The Force Awakens, Cleaner), Brenton Thwaites (Titans), Mark Coles Smith (Mystery Road: Origin), and Matt Whelan (Narcos).

After a catastrophic military disaster, the dead don’t just rise - they hunt. The military insists they are harmless and slow-moving, offering hope to grieving families. But when Ava (Daisy Ridley) enters a quarantine zone searching for her missing husband, she uncovers the horrifying truth: the undead are growing more violent, more relentless, and more dangerous with every passing hour.

We Bury The Dead is produced by Kelvin Munro, Grant Sputore, Ross M. Dinerstein, Joshua Harris, and Mark Fasano.

We Bury The Dead, written and directed by Zak Hilditch, opens nationwide only in theaters on January 2, 2026.
title: We Bury The Dead - Official Trailer (2026) Daisy Ridley, Brenton Thwaites

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Ghost of Yōtei's New Game Plus mode will be added in an update dropping November 24. You'll be able to start the adventure over with your weapons and upgrades carrying over from your last completed save file. There's also new camera featuresd, armor, cosmetics, and more. In other news, the director of the Marathon cinematic short film had to go onto social media to reassure the public that, no, the short was not made by AI. Director Alberto Mielgo claims that a staff of 155 people made the short, and it took them several months. This comes as more games—especially from Triple-A developers—are incorporating AI into their workflows. And finally, The Legend of Zelda animated series from the 80s will be streaming for free on Tubi. That should hold you over until the live-action feature-length film drops in 2027.
title: Ghost of Yōtei's New Game Plus Mode Detailed - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Start your engines. Watch the latest Mafia: The Old Country trailer for the action-adventure game to see what's coming with the Free Ride update, which brings the Free Ride Mode, with car and horse races, brutal combat and stealth challenges, and new secrets hidden throughout the Valle Dorata. The Free Ride Mode also features the Cinema Siciliano Mode for a vintage film aesthetic. Take the wheel with first-person driving, and push your limits in Classic Difficulty. Unlock new cars, stylish outfits, legendary weapons, and game-changing charms that redefine how you play. 

The Free Ride update for Mafia: The Old Country will be available on November 20, 2025.

#MafiaTheOldCountry #Gaming #IGN
title: Mafia: The Old Country - Official Free Ride Announce Trailer

description:
Legends assemble in the final endgame to save reality. Watch the latest Fortnite teaser trailer for the Chapter 6 Finale Live Event, Fortnite Zero Hour. The trailer showcases Homer Simpsons, Godzilla, Kong, and more. The fight begins in Fortnite Zero Hour when this Chapter 6 Finale Live Event begins on November 29 at 2 PM ET / 11 AM PT.

#Fortnite #Gaming #IGN

description:
If you want to make a bleed build in Where Winds Meet, the Strategic Sword is a must-have. Its Inner Track Slash and Second Track Slash Martial Arts will build up the bleeding effects on enemies before unleashing a burst of damage. Here's how to get the special sword.

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Nuketown 2025 Trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, the latest installment in the hit first-person shooter franchise developed by Treyarch. Players can return to the tried and true map of Nuketown with Nuketown 2025 returning to the franchise with Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 since it's debut on Call of Duty: Black Ops 2. Nuketown 2025 launches on November 20 for Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Official Nuketown 2025 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest trailer for Witch Hat Atelier! Witch Hat Atelier will be streaming on Crunchyroll in April 2026.

In a world where everyone takes wonders like magic spells and dragons for granted, Coco is a girl with a simple dream: She wants to be a witch. But everybody knows magicians are born, not made, and Coco was not born with a gift for magic. Resigned to her un-magical life, Coco is about to give up on her dream to become a witch…until the day she meets Qifrey, a mysterious, traveling magician. After secretly seeing Qifrey perform magic in a way she’s never seen before, Coco soon learns what everybody “knows” might not be the truth, and discovers that her magical dream may not be as far away as it may seem…

#IGN #Anime
title: Witch Hat Atelier - Official Trailer 2 (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Meet Dr. Maya Joshi' Trailer for Jurassic Park: Survival, an upcoming first-person action-adventure survival game set in the world of Jurassic Park developed by Saber Interactive. Players will get the chance to meet Dr. Maya Joshi, portrayed by Payal Mistry, who stars in the game as a courageous yet vulnerable character. Embark on Dr. Maya Joshi's adventure in Jurassic Park: Survival, coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#JurassicParkSurvival #Gaming #IGN
title: Jurassic Park: Survival - Official 'Meet Dr. Maya Joshi' Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'Breaking the Curse' Gameplay for Hytale, a revived adventure creation RPG developed by Hypixel Studios. Players will explore procedurally generated worlds, packed with creatures, dungeons, and secrets alike to shape the world as they see fit, one brick at a time. Engage with the game's deep combat system and enjoy over 16 minutes of new gameplay, announcing the game's return to full development. Hytale is coming to Early Access soon for PC.

Get more updates on the Hytale website here: http://www.hytale.com/
Check out the official Hytale YouTube channel here: https://www.youtube.com/@Hytale
title: Hytale - Official 'Breaking the Curse' Gameplay

Xbox is sharing new content reveals into games including 007 First Light, ReAnimal, Tides of Annihilation, and more third-party partners during a special Partner Preview Event on Thursday, November 20 at 10am PT / 1pm ET. Tune in for the exciting reveals! 

#IGN #Xbox
title: Xbox Partner Preview Event - November 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest WWE 2K25 trailer for the Farewell Tour edition, which celebrates wrestling icon John Cena. The Farewell Tour edition features four new playable Superstars, including WrestleMania 41 John Cena, Dr. of Thuganomics John Cena, Brock Lesnar, and Ron Cena, along with five Farewell Tour tee shirt cosmetic items. The WWE 2K25 Farewell Tour Edition is available now.

Step into the shoes of 17-time World Champion, John Cena, and celebrate the farewell of a true WWE legend. You can’t see him… but you’ll never forget him.

#WWE2K25 #Gaming #IGN
title: WWE 2K25 - Official Farewell Tour Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Ossidon Launch Trailer for ARK: Lost Colony, the hit expansion to the survival open-world action-adventure game ARK: Survival Ascended, developed by Studio Wildcard, Grove Street Games, and Instinct Games. Players can now access the Lost Colony Expansion Pass to gain access to the Ossidon, a hulking, engineered apex winter-predator built to dominate the frozen wastes of Arat Prime, which makes its way to the game. Find the creature temporarily roaming in cold biomes across Ragnarok, Valguero, and The Center until the ARK: Lost Colony Expansion arrives on December 16 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#ARKLostColony #Gaming #IGN
title: ARK: Lost Colony - Official Ossidon Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Enjoy this eight-minute video on The Vernyhorn, an upcoming third-person cinematic open-world RPG focused on story and a realistic combat system developed in collaboration with the current world champion in sword fighting - Antoni Olbrychski. This video shows off over six minutes of gameplay before finishing with a behind-the-scenes look at the team learning to get the sword play just right with Olbrychski. Wishlist The Vernyhorn on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3707530/The_Vernyhorn/

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Vernyhorn: Official Gameplay Trailer + MoCap With a Real-Live Swordmaster

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Announcement Trailer for Tales of Berseria Remastered, an anime narrative-driven action RPG developed by Bandai Namco. Players will experience the tale of Velvet Crowe’s journey of identity and truth on a grand adventure filled with unique characters, intense combat encounters, and a deep narrative remastered for the modern era. Join Velvet and a crew of pirates as they sail across the sea and throughout the kingdom of Midgand in Tales of Berseria Remastered, launching on February 27, 2026, for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#TalesOfBerseriaRemastered #Gaming #IGN
title: Tales of Berseria Remastered - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Family Guy Holiday Special titled: Disney’s Hulu’s Family Guy’s Hallmark Channel’s Lifetime’s Familiar Holiday Movie for Family Guy, the comedic animated series distributed by Hulu. Explore the true meaning of Christmas with the Disney’s Hulu’s Family Guy’s Hallmark Channel’s Lifetime Familiar Holiday Movie, coming to Hulu and Hulu on Disney+ on November 28.

In Family Guy’s take on generic holiday movies, Lois, who works for “Big Pie” travels to a small town in hopes of stealing Peter’s award-winning family secret pie recipe.

The Family Guy Holiday Special 2025 stars Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green, Mila Kunis, Arif Zahir, Lainey Wilson, and more. Seth MacFarlane is creator and executive producer. Rich Appel and Alec Sulkin serve as executive producers and showrunners, while Steve Callaghan, Tom Devanney, Danny Smith, Kara Vallow, Mark Hentemann, Patrick Meighan and Alex Carter are executive producers.

The Family Guy Holiday Special titled: Disney’s Hu
title: Family Guy - Official Holiday Special 2025 Trailer (2025) Seth MacFarlane, Mila Kunis

description:
Let's check out the trailer for Mega Zeraora, the Thunderclap Pokemon coming in the Pokemon Legends: Z-A – Mega Dimension DLC!

What do you think of our first look at Mega Zeraora? According to the developers, getting Mega Zeraora for your team will be a little difficult. and you'll have to keep your eyes peeled for a way to encounter it as you play through the DLC!

#PokemonLegendsZA #Gaming #IGN
title: Pokemon Legends: Z-A - Our First Look at Mega Zeraora! Coming With the Mega Dimension DLC

author: IGN
description: While many aspects of Dragon Quest VII Reimagined are still a mystery, all of those special little qualities and personalities that have kept this series going for almost 40 years are still on display. And its new visuals are certainly weird. Whether that's a good weird or a bad weird is up to you. Previewed by Scott White
title: Dragon Quest VII Reimagined Goes Much Farther Than the HD-2D Remakes

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Ghost of Yotei trailer for the action-adventure game to see what's coming with the free patch, which will introduce New Game Plus, allowing you to replay Atsu’s quest for vengeance from the beginning with everything you earned throughout the campaign, along with new armor, difficulty options, and more. The update also brings new features to the base game, including replayable content, new accessibility options, and new photo mode improvements. The Ghost of Yotei update patch 1.100.000 will be available on November 24, 2025.

#GhostOfYotei #Gaming #IGN
title: Ghost of Yotei - Official New Game Plus Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Kirby Air Riders reviewed by Logan Plant on Nintendo Switch 2.

I’m not sure what’s crazier: the fact that Kirby Air Riders exists, or the fact that it’s this great. It’s a blast in local or online multiplayer during its traditional races and unique battle mode, and its frankly absurd amount of fun achievements to chase, meaningful unlockables, and deep customization make it great for solo players, too. The biggest hurdle to enjoying its dizzying amount of content is how it all controls, as its frantic pace and slippery one-button control scheme is endearingly novel, but occasionally too simple for its own good. Air Riders just can’t help itself in sticking a little too closely to its original blueprint at times, making it not as approachable to pick up and play as Mario Kart, and not as technically rewarding or competitively viable as a fighting game like Super Smash Bros. But if you’re willing to go along for the ride, you’re in for a chaotic action racing game that’s a great time w
title: Kirby Air Riders Review

author: IGN
description:
Disney Dreamlight Valley's Wishblossom Ranch expansion reviewed by Travis Northup on PC, also available on Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 5, and Nintendo Switch 1.

Disney Dreamlight Valley’s Wishblossom Ranch expansion is an intriguing new chapter in a cozy game I’ve enjoyed for several years, but it also suffers from some growing pains. The new areas are filled with some of the most creative stuff I’ve seen in a life simulator in quite some time, and the four-legged companions you can ride offer fun ways to engage with familiar cozy activities, not to mention make getting around so much faster. I would have liked some more exciting new characters to befriend, and the grind to level up your relationship with each of the mounts has unnecessary timegates that I could have done without, but these missteps didn’t drag down the good times too much. Instead, the real issue is that, at the time of this review, Wishblossom Ranch has just been way too buggy to comfortably enjoy (or in my case e
title: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Wishblossom Ranch Review

author: IGN
description:
Goat Simulator 3's Baadlands: Furry Road expansion is out now on Steam, the Epic Games Store, Microsoft Store, PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, and Xbox Series X/S. Watch the Goat Simulator 3 Baadlands: Furry Road launch trailer to see what to expect with this expansion, which features new quests, a motorcycle to ride, and more as you fight hordes of raiders in an apocalypse setting. 

The world has ended, and San Angora has transformed into a vast desert, holding sand-swept secrets waiting to be uncovered. In Baadlands: Furry Road, players will once again step into the hooves of Pilgor, the antihero and now-survivor of the apocalypse, setting off on the most chaotic adventure yet. Complete calamitous quests, rebuild a town from scratch using collectable scraps, and use the latest fiery Goat Gears to fight your way through hordes of raiders on your journey to discover the secret behind the mysterious vault door.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Goat Simulator 3 - Official Baadlands: Furry Road Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Gameplay Reveal Trailer for Fatekeeper, an action hack-and-slash first-person RPG developed by Paraglacial. Players will explore an expansive world and engage in deep melee-based combat against enemies along the path towards a heavy warrior. Master a suite of different spells to gain the edge in Fatekeeper, coming soon to PC (Steam).
title: Fatekeeper - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer

I’m not sure what’s crazier: the fact that Kirby Air Riders exists, or the fact that it’s this great. author: IGN
description: The Analogue 3D is the best possible way to play your N64 library outside of the original hardware hooked up to a CRT. Its refined industrial design makes it an attractive modern addition to your gaming set-up, and the massive flexibility afforded by its bountiful filters and display options lets you fine tune the visuals to fit your exacting, personal specifications. This is an FPGA machine built with the hardcore enthusiast in mind, and gives new life to a system that's notoriously difficult to accurately emulate.
title: Analogue 3D Review

author: IGN
description:
Check out the first 16 minutes of Tomb Raider (2013) running on Nintendo Switch 2, captured in 4K. Aspyr and Crystal Dynamics have finally brought Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition to Nintendo platforms for the very first time. See how Lara’s origin story looks and plays on next-gen handheld hardware as we dive into the opening moments of Crystal Dynamics’ acclaimed reboot.

00:00 – Opening Cutscene
02:32 – Cave Gameplay Begins
09:24 – Outside Gameplay / Title Screen
13:00 – Finding Shelter
title: Tomb Raider (2013): First 16 Minutes of Nintendo Switch 2 Gameplay | Captured in 4K

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'Token White Guy' Clip for Rental Family, an upcoming comedy-drama distributed by Searchlight Pictures. Explore the journey of unexpected connections in Rental Family, in theaters on November 21.

Set against modern-day Tokyo, an American actor who struggles to find purpose until he lands an unusual gig: working for a Japanese "rental family" agency, playing stand-in roles for strangers. As he immerses himself in his clients’ worlds, he begins to form genuine bonds that blur the lines between performance and reality. Confronting the moral complexities of his work, he rediscovers purpose, belonging, and the quiet beauty of human connection.

Rental Family stars Brendan Fraser, Takehiro Hira, Mari Yamamoto, Nihi, Akira Emoto, and more. The film is directed by Hikari and produced by Eddie Vaisman, p.g.a, Julia Lebedev, p.g.a, HIKARI, p.g.a, Shin Yamaguchi, p.g.a.

Rental Family is in theaters on November 21.
title: Rental Family - Official 'Token White Guy' Clip (2025) Brendan Fraser, Takehiro Hira

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'Sully's Never Quit' Clip for Avatar: Fire and Ash, the third installment in James Cameron's sci-fi drama action films distributed by 20th Century Studios. Witness a daring chase through the woods as the fire-based tribe closes in on Sully's family . Avatar: Fire and Ash is in theaters worldwide in IMAX 3D, Dolby Cinema 3D, RealD 3D, Cinemark XD, 4DX, ScreenX, and premium screens everywhere on December 19, 2025.

With Avatar: Fire and Ash, James Cameron takes audiences back to Pandora in an immersive new adventure with Marine turned Na’vi leader Jake Sully, Na’vi warrior Neytiri, and the Sully family. 

Avatar: Fire and Ash stars Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldaña, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang, and more. The film is directed by James Cameron alongside the screenplay by James Cameron & Rick Jaffa & Amanda Silver. The story is by James Cameron & Rick Jaffa & Amanda Silver & Josh Friedman & Shane Salerno, also stars Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang, Oona Chaplin, Cliff Curtis, Br
title: Avatar: Fire and Ash - Official 'Sully's Never Quit' Clip (2025) Oona Chaplin, Britain Dalton
